full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Veterans' Grave Markers

**Tender Reference Number:** WS4025525267
**Solicitation Number:** WS4025525267
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-15
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-04 at 14:00 EDT
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Background:**
Veterans Affairs Canada (VAC) is seeking bids for the supply of Veteran's grave markers in the province of Saskatchewan.

**Scope of Work:**
The scope of work includes repairs to Veteran's grave markers, installation of new foundations, replacement of broken and illegible markers, as well as landscaping and maintenance services.

**Requirements:**
Successful bidders will be required to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by the tender closing date.

**Trade Agreements:**
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contact Information:**
For further information or to submit a bid, please contact Matthew Keenan (matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) at the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

**Document Attachments:**
There are no document attachments related to this tender.

**Notice URL:**
For more information, please visit: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16598047?extsite=MTY1OTgwNDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==



**Amended Tender**
Please note that the closing time for bid submissions has been amended to 2023-07-04 at 14:00 EDT. All bid submissions received after this time will be deemed non-responsive.



Limitations
- The bid submission deadline has been changed to 2023-07-04 at 14:00 EDT
- All supporting documents and bid submissions must be received by the above-mentioned deadline.



Directions
- Open the link to the Notice URL above and follow the instructions for accessing the tender information and bid submission form.



Answer to inquiries
- Accepted questions must be received by the deadline to be answered by the end of the second day of the bid opening.
- The bid opening to be held on a schedule at the meet specified within this formal document.
